name: ZombDart
description:
ZombDart is a fun arcade game featuring a REAL looking zombie that actually feels pain. When you hit him with darts, he screams with real facial animations and body movements making you feel his pain with him.

The main objective of the game is NOT to hit the zombie but hit all the bullseyes as you can to progress to the next level. As you clear all the bullseyes you advance to the next level, making the spinning wheel go faster and faster.

To get you in the scary mood, the game features life like animations, great lighting, theme music, sounds and more.

Game Features:

* Online Leader Boards to compete your score against others

ZombDart was developed by Ultra Line Software, and created in the Unity Game Engine.

For more information, visit: www.ultralinesoftware.com.

ULS would like to thank you for your support.
